title: Locate canister ID and provide DNS configuration instructions for raavni.com

requirements.text: Search through the project's deployment configuration files (dfx.json, canister configuration files, or deployment metadata) to locate and extract the Internet Computer canister ID for the deployed Raavni Agrobyte application
acceptanceCriteria: The canister ID is successfully located from project configuration files
The full canister URL in format https://[canister-id].ic0.app is identified
If the canister ID cannot be found in configuration files, provide clear guidance on where to locate it

requirements.text: Generate a comprehensive DNS configuration guide document that includes: (1) the specific full canister URL for the Raavni Agrobyte application, (2) step-by-step instructions for configuring Cloudflare DNS with the exact CNAME record settings needed to point raavni.com to the canister URL, (3) SSL certificate setup instructions for Cloudflare with recommended SSL/TLS mode settings, and (4) DNS propagation timeline and verification steps

quotes: Find the canister ID AND prepare DNS setup instructions
pointing raavni.com to your deployed application using Cloudflare

acceptanceCriteria: A complete DNS configuration guide is generated with the actual canister URL populated
Cloudflare-specific CNAME record configuration steps are provided with exact values (Name: @, Value: [canister-id].ic0.app, Proxy status: enabled)
SSL/TLS configuration instructions specify the recommended mode (Full or Full (strict))
Guide includes DNS propagation timeline (24-48 hours) and verification steps
Instructions are clear, actionable, and suitable for users without deep technical expertise

constraints: The canister ID must be retrieved from actual project files, not invented or guessed
Do not modify any existing deployment configurations or files
The DNS configuration guide is informational only and does not automate the Cloudflare setup process
nonGoals: Automatically configuring DNS records in Cloudflare
Implementing custom domain routing within the Internet Computer application
Providing support for DNS providers other than Cloudflare
